alert.note: Alert for Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN ARANSAS... NORTHWESTERN CALHOUN...SOUTH CENTRAL VICTORIA AND NORTHEASTERN REFUGIO COUNTIES THROUGH 545 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tivoli, or 7 miles east of McFaddin, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Green Lake, Tivoli, Aransas National Wildlife Refuge, Long Mott, and Austwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Aransas; Coastal Refugio; Inland Calhoun
